alert.note: Alert for Deschutes (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 2:45PM PDT until May 19 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Deschutes County in central Oregon... * Until 345 PM PDT. * At 245 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Sunriver, or 18 miles west of Bend, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sisters. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
